**/FAQ\**
Where are the servers located?
Kansas City, MO(USA).

How long does it take to set up an account?
VPS Servers are instantly setup!

Can I host/register domains?
Yes you can register domains,they will be instantly setup in less then 1 min.

Are proxies allowed?
Only private ones are allowed. No public proxies are allowed.

Is Rapid Leech Allowed?
No. We do not allow Rapid Leech on our servers.

Is IRC Allowed?
No. We do not allow IRC or IRC Bots on our servers.

Please submit a ticket if you have any further questions or concerns.
Contact us for custom plans to fit your needs and budget.

No refunds for domain registrations & control panels. Shared & Reseller Accounts have a 30 day money back guarantee. VPS have a 14 day money back guarantee. Dedicated Servers go by the terms stated in the Terms of Service.
